description:
Song Qian was the famous 'Sesshomaru' in the underworld, the top assassin in the Red Lotus Assassin Hiring Center.

On her eighteenth birthday, she sneaked into the presidential suite to enjoy a night! She met a hooligan with great fighting capacity...

'You know who I am? Carefully I kick your ass!'

'Pussy cat, maybe you are the one!'

An hour later, 'From now on! You are my Enemy No.1!'

...

Six years later... She pretended to be a male bodyguard to get her daughter back. Her daughter was addicted to handsome boys.

“Why you are blushing? Why you don't pee?” He approached her slowly.

'Emm... Boss Pei, you didn't wash your hands after...' 

'Bodyguard Song! If I change my sexual orientation because of you, you should be responsible for me!'>
